name: Deep-Fried Cheese Bites
ingredients: 12 ounce package Wisconsin Farms Frying Cheese or Mexican Frying Cheese

instructions.en: Heat the oil in deep fryer according to the manufacturer's instructions
instructions.sk: Zohrejte olej vo fritéze podľa pokynov výrobcu
instructions.ja: 製造元の指示に従って、ディープフライヤーで油を加熱する

instructions.en: Cut the cheese into 3/4 inch (2 cm) cubes
instructions.sk: Nakrájajte syr na kocky s veľkosťou 2 cm

instructions.en: Carefully drop a few cubes of cheese into the hot oil, frying in small batches to prevent sticking
instructions.sk: Opatrne vhoďte niekoľko kociek syra do horúceho oleja, smažte v malých dávkach, aby sa nezlepili
instructions.ja: 熱した油に少量のチーズキューブを慎重に入れる。くっつかないよう少量ずつ揚げる

instructions.en: Keep moving the cheese cubes with a spatula to prevent them from touching each other
instructions.sk: Pohybujte kockami syra pomocou varešky, aby sa navzájom nedotýkali
instructions.ja: ヘラを使ってチーズキューブを動かし、互いにくっつかないようにする

instructions.en: Remove cheese bites as soon as they turn golden brown
instructions.sk: Vyberte syrové kúsky hneď, ako zhnednú do zlatista
instructions.ja: きつね色になったらすぐにチーズバイトを取り出す
ペーパータオルの上で油を切る

instructions.en: Serve hot with marinara sauce, if desired
instructions.sk: Podávajte horúce s marinara omáčkou, ak chcete
instructions.ja: お好みでマリナラソースと一緒に熱いうちに提供する
